You can update the indicator automatically or manually.

Automatic Update

To register a manual indicator for automatic updates with the security data, call the RegisterIndicator method.

using QuantConnect.Indicators.CandlestickPatterns;

private StickSandwich _sticksandwich;

// In Initialize()
_sticksandwich = new StickSandwich(name);
_sticksandwich.Updated += IndicatorUpdateMethod;

RegisterIndicator(symbol, _sticksandwich, Resolution.Daily);

// In IndicatorUpdateMethod()
if (_sticksandwich.IsReady)
{
    var indicatorValue = _sticksandwich.Current.Value;
}
from QuantConnect.Indicators.CandlestickPatterns import StickSandwich
    
# In Initialize()
self.sticksandwich = StickSandwich(name)
self.sticksandwich.Updated += self.IndicatorUpdateMethod

self.RegisterIndicator(symbol, self.sticksandwich, Resolution.Daily)

# In IndicatorUpdateMethod()
if self.sticksandwich.IsReady:
    indicator_value = self.sticksandwich.Current.Value

To customize the data that automatically updates the indicator, see Custom Indicator Periods and Custom Indicator Values.

Manual Update

Updating your indicator manually enables you to control when the indicator is updated and what data you use to update it. To manually update the indicator, call the Update method with a TradeBar. The indicator will only be ready after you prime it with enough data.

using QuantConnect.Indicators.CandlestickPatterns;
    
private StickSandwich _sticksandwich;
private Symbol symbol;

// In Initialize()
_sticksandwich = new StickSandwich();
symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;

// In OnData()
if (data.Bars.ContainsKey(_symbol))
{
    _sticksandwich.Update(data.Bars[symbol]);
}
if (_sticksandwich.IsReady)
{
    var indicatorValue = _sticksandwich.Current.Value;
}
from QuantConnect.Indicators.CandlestickPatterns import StickSandwich
    
# In Initialize()
self.sticksandwich = StickSandwich()
self.symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol

# In OnData()
if data.Bars.ContainsKey(self.symbol):
    self.sticksandwich.Update(data.Bars[self.symbol])
if self.sticksandwich.IsReady:
    indicator_value = self.sticksandwich.Current.Value
